chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
chapter.para: The &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor provides interaction with XMPP resources, supporting XMPP Client and Component connections. The RA adapts the well known and open source SMACK 3.x XMPP Client API, from JIVE Software, extending it with XMPP Component connections. For further information about the SMACK API refer to its website at .
